title: Restoration Potion
summaries: The Restoration Potion is a recovery potion that restores health ((Old-gen console and 3DS versions) and mana) and inflicts Potion Sickness when used. Despite its appearance, it is not created by upgrading Lesser Restoration Potions.
Consuming a Restoration Potion has the following effect:

• (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) Restores 90 health and inflicts Potion Sickness for only 45 seconds (rather than the usual 60 of health-restoring potions).
    • The duration of Potion Sickness can be further reduced to 33.75 seconds via the Philosopher's Stone or Charm of Myths.
  • (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) Restores 100 health and 100 mana. Potion Sickness lasts for the full 60 seconds.
